medium: Cypress Case w/ sections of original Mahogany body
title: Upright piano
description: Works of Piano are made by Steinway  Carved case designed by Bradstreet; cypress case with sections of original mahogany Steinway body, trunks, carved open fretwork composed of vertical slats with lily pads and clouds superimposed. hinged lid, removeable door below keyboard.
creditline: Gift of funds from Wheaton Wood, by exchange
